import re

def validate_license_agreement(license_text):
    condition1 = re.search('Redistribution.*disclaimer\\.', license_text, re.DOTALL) is None
    condition2 = re.search('Redistribution.*disclaimer.*documentation', license_text, re.DOTALL) is not None
    condition3 = 'endorse or promote products derived from this software without specific prior written permission' in license_text
    return condition1 and condition2 and condition3

import re

def validate_license_agreement(license_text):
    condition1 = re.search('Redistribution.*disclaimer\\.', license_text, re.DOTALL) is not None
    condition2 = re.search('', license_text, re.DOTALL) is not None
    condition3 = 'endorse or promote products derived from this software without specific prior written permission' in license_text
    return condition1 and condition2 and condition3
